"A Mysterious Presence in the Ruins?":
"Thanks for helping me out earlier partner.
...Oh, by the way, you wouldn't happen to have some
free time would you? The last time as went to the Ruins,
I felt a strange presence. I really want to go an
investigate it but going alone is probably a bad idea.
Would you come with me to check it out? If
there's nothing we can come straight back home.
*Clear on Very Hard or higher with an S rank
traveling only with Afin "

"相棒、この間はありがとよ。
……ところで、今時間あったりするか？
この間、遺跡に行った時に、何か変な
気配がしたんだよ。
調査に行きたいのは山々なんだけど、一人
じゃ心細いだろ。よかったらついてきて
くれないか？　何もなければ、すぐに
帰ってくるからさ。
※アフィンのみ同行、
ベリーハード以上Ｓランククリア"
